title: Sentosa ONE Countdown - Mediacorp Let's Celebrate
blurb: Celebrate the countdown at Siloso Beach Walk.
description: Celebrate the new year at Sentosa's Siloso Beach Walk with Mediacorp's Let's Celebrate 2026 Countdown Show. Enjoy a night of music, fireworks, and fun for the whole family as you welcome the new year in style. This event promises an unforgettable experience with live performances and a spectacular fireworks display to light up the night sky. It's the perfect way to create lasting memories with your loved ones as you step into the new year together. Join the festivities and make this countdown one to remember!

title: Heartland ONE Countdown - Punggol
blurb: Countdown to 2026 at One Punggol!
description: Celebrate the countdown to 2026 at the Heartland ONE Countdown in Punggol! This free event features fireworks and is expected to be somewhat crowded. Enjoy the festivities at One Punggol – Celebration Square and The Plaza/ Open Field. This family-friendly event promises an exciting atmosphere as we approach the new year. Bring your loved ones and join the community in welcoming 2026 with a bang! The event includes music, performances, and a spectacular fireworks display to light up the night sky. Be sure to arrive early to secure a good spot and enjoy the various activities planned for the evening. This is a perfect opportunity to create lasting memories with family and friends.
datetime_display: Open Field in front of One Punggol, S828629

title: Kallang ONE Countdown at Singapore Sports Hub
blurb: Countdown 2026 at OCBC Square with free admission.
description: Celebrate the Kallang ONE Countdown at the Singapore Sports Hub's OCBC Square. Enjoy the festive atmosphere and a spectacular fireworks display as you usher in the new year. This free event offers a vibrant and exciting experience for families and individuals alike. Join the community in a memorable countdown celebration filled with joy and anticipation. The event promises a night of entertainment and camaraderie, making it a perfect way to welcome the new year with loved ones. Be part of the excitement and create lasting memories at this iconic Singapore location.
datetime_display: friendly space featuring engaging stage performances and interactive acts tailored for both the young and seniors at the OCBC Square

title: Sentosa ONE Countdown - Movies by the Beach
blurb: Movie Marathon at Palawan Kidz City Roof Garden
description: Enjoy a movie marathon at Palawan Kidz City Roof Garden as part of the Sentosa ONE Countdown. This event offers a family-friendly atmosphere with free admission. Bring your own snacks and drinks to enjoy while watching movies under the stars. The event aims to provide a safe and enjoyable environment for families to celebrate the countdown to the new year. The movie selection caters to a wide range of audiences, ensuring that everyone can find something they enjoy. This is a great opportunity to spend quality time with loved ones and create lasting memories. The venue is easily accessible and offers ample space for families to relax and enjoy the movies. The event is designed to be inclusive and welcoming to all, regardless of age or background. The organisers have taken steps to ensure the safety and comfort of all attendees, making it a worry-free experience for families.
datetime_display: friends included) will love! Our outdoor movie marathon features a crowd-pleasing mix of action and comedy, building the excitement as we count down to 2026

title: Clarke Quay ONE Countdown - CQ NYE Countdown
blurb: Celebrate New Year's Eve at Clarke Quay!
description: Ring in the New Year at Clarke Quay with live music, dining specials, and a vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy a memorable countdown experience with friends and family at this iconic riverside destination. Clarke Quay offers a variety of restaurants and bars to suit every taste, making it the perfect place to celebrate the start of a new year. The event promises an exciting night filled with entertainment and festivities, creating lasting memories as you welcome the year ahead. Clarke Quay's lively ambiance and stunning waterfront views provide an ideal backdrop for a New Year's Eve celebration. Join the crowd and experience the energy of the countdown as the clock strikes midnight.

title: Marina Bay Singapore Countdown 2026
blurb: Celebrate the New Year at Marina Bay.
description: The Marina Bay Singapore Countdown is an annual New Year's Eve celebration held in Singapore. It features a fireworks display, light projections, and live performances. The event attracts hundreds of thousands of people to the Marina Bay area. This free event offers a vibrant atmosphere for families and individuals to welcome the new year together. Enjoy the dazzling fireworks and soak in the festive spirit as you bid farewell to the old year and embrace the new one. The countdown event is a highlight of Singapore's festive calendar, promising an unforgettable experience for all attendees. Be sure to arrive early to secure a good viewing spot and enjoy the pre-show entertainment.

title: Heartland ONE Countdown @ Boon Lay
blurb: Celebrate the New Year at Boon Lay!
description: Join the Heartland ONE Countdown at Boon Lay for a night of fun and celebration! Enjoy free admission to this event featuring fireworks and a lively atmosphere. This event is expected to be somewhat crowded, so plan accordingly and arrive early to secure a good spot. Experience the excitement as we welcome the new year together with the community. This family-friendly event promises an enjoyable evening for all ages. Be part of the festivities and create lasting memories as we build brighter futures together in the heartlands. Don't miss out on the spectacular fireworks display that will light up the night sky, marking the beginning of a new year filled with hope and possibilities. Come and be a part of this special occasion!
venue_name: Hardcourt in front of Blk 215 Boon Lay Place

title: Sentosa ONE Countdown - Discover Your Good
blurb: Discover your good at Sentosa ONE Countdown.
description: Celebrate the countdown to the new year at Sentosa's Sensoryscape. Enjoy the fireworks and free admission to discover your good. This event is somewhat crowded.
datetime_display: friendship and the timeless power of doing good resonate through larger-than-life installations

title: Marina Bay ONE Countdown - Togetherland
blurb: Experience the Marina Bay Countdown.
description: Celebrate the New Year at Marina Bay with the Togetherland by World Christmas Market. Enjoy the fireworks and festive atmosphere. This event promises a memorable experience for all attendees. Immerse yourself in a vibrant celebration featuring a variety of attractions and activities suitable for families and individuals alike. The market offers a diverse range of festive treats, unique gifts, and engaging entertainment, creating a lively and enjoyable atmosphere for everyone. The countdown event is designed to provide a safe and secure environment, ensuring that all visitors can fully enjoy the festivities. With a focus on community and togetherness, the event aims to create lasting memories and a positive start to the New Year. The fireworks display will be a spectacular highlight, illuminating the night sky and adding to the excitement of the celebration. Join us for an unforgettable New Year's Eve experience at Marina Bay.

title: Heartland ONE Countdown - Woodlands Countdown
blurb: Countdown to 2026 at Woodlands Waterfront!
description: Celebrate the countdown to 2026 at Woodlands Waterfront! This event promises a vibrant atmosphere with music, food, and fun activities for all ages. Enjoy live performances, delicious food stalls, and engaging games as we usher in the new year together. The event aims to bring the community together for a memorable celebration. Bring your family and friends to enjoy the festivities and create lasting memories as we look forward to a brighter future. The countdown event will feature local artists and performers, showcasing the diverse talents of Singapore. There will also be interactive installations and photo opportunities to capture the spirit of the celebration. Don't miss out on this exciting event as we countdown to 2026!

title: Keat Hong Comes Alive 2026 Countdown
blurb: Keat Hong Countdown Celebrations.
description: Celebrate the countdown to 2026 at Keat Hong Square! Enjoy the festivities and welcome the new year with your community. This event features fireworks and paid admission.

title: Heartland ONE Countdown - Tampines: OTH Celebrations
blurb: OTH Countdown Celebrations to 2026 in Tampines.
description: Celebrate the countdown to 2026 at Our Tampines Hub (OTH). This heartland event features live performances, food stalls, and a dazzling fireworks display. Enjoy a family-friendly atmosphere with activities for all ages. The event aims to bring the community together to celebrate and look forward to the upcoming years. With free admission and a variety of entertainment options, it's a perfect way to spend the evening with loved ones. Be sure to arrive early to secure a good spot for the fireworks display. The event promises a memorable experience for everyone attending, fostering community spirit and creating lasting memories. Don't miss out on the fun and excitement as Tampines counts down to 2026!

title: Sentosa ONE Countdown - Sentosa 2026 by the Beach
blurb: Sentosa ONE Countdown at Sensoryscape.
description: Celebrate the Sentosa ONE Countdown at Sensoryscape, 3 Siloso Road, Sentosa. Enjoy the fireworks and free admission to this event. This event is expected to be somewhat crowded. The countdown event promises an unforgettable experience as Sentosa welcomes the new year with a spectacular display of fireworks and beachside festivities. Join fellow revelers in a vibrant atmosphere filled with music, entertainment, and joyous celebrations. As the clock strikes midnight, prepare to be mesmerized by the dazzling fireworks illuminating the night sky, creating a breathtaking spectacle against the backdrop of the beautiful Sentosa beach. This event is perfect for families and friends looking to create lasting memories as they bid farewell to the old year and embrace the possibilities of the new.
datetime_display: friendly fun at Palawan Kidz City Rooftop, a fun-filled carnival with games at Palawan Green, and other festive installations at Sensoryscape for all to enjoy! title: Kallang ONE Countdown -Fireworks at Singapore
blurb: Fireworks at Singapore Sports Hub for countdown.
description: Celebrate the new year with a dazzling fireworks display at the Singapore Sports Hub. This free event offers a spectacular visual treat for families and individuals alike. Gather at the Stadium Riverside Walk to witness the vibrant colors light up the night sky as you usher in the new year. The event promises a memorable experience with the stunning backdrop of the Singapore skyline. Be sure to arrive early to secure a good viewing spot and enjoy the festive atmosphere. This family-friendly event is a perfect way to end the year on a high note and create lasting memories with loved ones. The fireworks display is designed to be visually captivating and suitable for all ages, making it an ideal outing for families with children. Don't miss this opportunity to be part of a joyous celebration and welcome the new year with excitement and wonder.

title: Sentosa ONE Countdown at ACC9SS: PAC-MAN

description: Celebrate New Year's Eve at Sentosa's ACC9SS with the PAC-MAN Carnival. Enjoy the countdown with fireworks and a lively atmosphere. This event offers a unique way to welcome the new year with family and friends. Experience the excitement and fun at Palawan Green, Sentosa, as you join in the festivities.

blurb: Celebrate the New Year at Marina Bay.
description: Celebrate the New Year at Marina Bay with dazzling fireworks and a vibrant atmosphere. Be sure to arrive early to secure a good viewing spot, as it tends to get very crowded. Enjoy the countdown and welcome the new year with joy and excitement. The event promises a memorable experience for all ages, with food stalls and entertainment adding to the festive spirit. Get ready to dance, sing along, and be mesmerized by the dazzling fireworks that will light up the night sky.

title: Kallang ONE Countdown 2026 at Singapore Hub

With world-class facilities and a bustling atmosphere, it's the perfect place to celebrate special occasions and create lasting memories. The Water Sports Centre provides a unique setting for the countdown, combining the excitement of the festivities with the scenic views of the waterfront. Join us for an unforgettable night of celebration as we welcome the new year together.

title: Heartland ONE Countdown - Marsiling Party
blurb: Celebrate the new year at Marsiling party.
description: Celebrate the countdown at the Heartland ONE Countdown - Marsiling 2026 Countdown Party. Enjoy the fireworks and usher in the new year with fellow residents.

title: Countdown 2026 at Singapore Sports Hub
blurb: Chill at a scenic riverside space with fireworks.
description:
Relax and chill at a scenic riverside space featuring ambient vibes with a spectacular view of the fireworks displays. Catch the live feed of the Countdown 2026 Concert together - perfect for those who prefer to celebrate in a laid-back atmosphere under the stars. Admission is free.

Let your experience be complemented by a lively countdown procession around the Singapore Sports Hub precinct from 7-10pm, with dazzling displays of music-synchronised fireworks fired from Kallang Basin from 9pm and interspersed throughout the hours leading up to midnight.

Tips: Come early, bring your own picnic mat and chill out with us. Pre-order festive picnic boxes for a fuss-free experience at the link below!

title: Nee Soon Countdown 2026 - Dare to Dream
blurb: Catch live performances and watch the fireworks.
description:
Catch live performances, play the carnival rides and games, browse youth market booths, and watch the fireworks.
Use public transport, travel light, bring your umbrella and stay hydrated with your water bottle - Enjoy and welcome 2026 as one community!
venue_name: Open field next to FutsalArena @ Yishun
